document_data.caption: Cover of ''The Fanged Crown''.
document_data.title: The Fanged Crown
document_data.author: [[Jenna Helland]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''The Fanged Crown''''' by [[Jenna Helland]] is the first novel in [[The Wilds]] series.
{{Quote| ''[[Tethyr]]ian colonists sent to the jungle island of [[Chult]] have vanished and only their celebrated leader has returned. The story he tells of disease and monsters rings false to his enemies—a former mutineer is sent to discover what really happened to the Lost Colony, and what the Hero of Tethyr is hiding.''}}
